nodes.excerpt: Spilldash is a free Google Sheets add-on that lets you automate dashboard building in a new way. Manage dashboard with configurations like a web application but without the complexity. Watch video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7YxYpqDvRM

localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets上創建報告的一種新的、自動化的方式。

nodes.excerpt: A place where you can find the best free virtual backgrounds for your video calls. You can use them on Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Skype, Google Meet, WebEx or any other apps with custom background features.

nodes.excerpt: Enter a URL, intercept the font files as the site loads, and download. Voila! You’ve got some new fonts. Does not work on all websites; not legal. Will you use it?
nodes.title: Font Interceptor - Font Interceptor downloads all fonts in use on a website

localize.description: 输入一个URL，在网站加载时截取字体文件，然后下载。瞧！你已经有了一些新的字体。你已经有了一些新的字体。并非所有网站都能使用；不合法。你会使用它吗？
localize.tagline: 字体拦截器下载网站上使用的所有字体。

nodes.excerpt: OneSimpleApi was born out of the idea that there should be a simple way of achieving complex features, when working with no-code tools. A toolbox, where you can find all the APIs that will make your creation go the extra mile: Just... One Simple API.
nodes.title: OneSimpleApi.com - The first API toolkit for no-coders
nodes.author: Pablius

localize.description: OneSimpleApi诞生于这样一个理念：在使用无代码工具时，应该有一种简单的方式来实现复杂的功能。一个工具箱，在这里你可以找到所有的API，这将使你的创作更上一层楼。只要... 一个简单的API。
localize.tagline: 首个面向无码者的API工具包

localize.description: OneSimpleApi誕生於這樣一個理念：在使用無代碼工具時，應該有一種簡單的方式來實現複雜的功能。一個工具箱，在這裏你可以找到所有的API，這將使你的創作更上一層樓。只要... 一個簡單的API。
localize.tagline: 首個面向無碼者的API工具包

nodes.excerpt: Creating a nice looking SVG Color Matrix filter is tricky. This free web-app helps you easily create the right color matrix for your picture. Add contrast, brightness, hue, and saturation filters or adjust one or multiple matrix values simultaneously.
nodes.title: SVG Color Matrix Mixer - Generate nice looking color matrix filters for your images
nodes.author: Rik Schennink

localize.description: 创建一个好看的SVG颜色矩阵滤镜是很棘手的。这个免费的网络应用可以帮助你轻松地为你的图片创建正确的颜色矩阵。添加对比度、亮度、色调和饱和度滤镜或同时调整一个或多个矩阵值。
localize.tagline: 为您的图像生成漂亮的彩色矩阵滤镜。

localize.description: 創建一個好看的SVG顏色矩陣濾鏡是很棘手的。這個免費的網絡應用可以幫助你輕鬆地爲你的圖片創建正確的顏色矩陣。添加對比度、亮度、色調和飽和度濾鏡或同時調整一個或多個矩陣值。
localize.tagline: 爲您的圖像生成漂亮的彩色矩陣濾鏡。

nodes.excerpt: Do you remember the date you launch your product? 🤷‍♂‍ How can you begin to measure the impact of any event on website behavior if you can’t remember when it happened? Add Automated Annotations to Google Analytics - Ads Campaigns, Newsletter Releas...
nodes.title: GAannotations - Automate your Google Analytics annotations
nodes.author: Fernando Ideses

localize.description: 你还记得你推出产品的日期吗？🤷♂如果你不记得任何事件发生的时间，你怎么能开始衡量它对网站行为的影响？在谷歌分析中添加自动注释--广告活动、电子报发布、...
localize.tagline: 自动化您的谷歌分析注释

nodes.excerpt: Make Zoom meetings FUN! Kickoff your next one with Tricktionary, a 5-min creative stoke to engage your audience. Optimized for 4-14 players. *Today only* we are hosting a livestream marathon if you want to play with us. Link on landing page.
nodes.title: Tricktionary - Creative icebreaker game for Zoom meetings
nodes.author: Graig from Tricktionary

localize.description: 让Zoom会议充满乐趣 用Tricktionary为您的下一次会议揭开序幕，5分钟的创意刺激让您的听众参与其中。优化为4-14名玩家。*仅限今天*，如果你想和我们一起玩，我们将举办一场直播马拉松。链接在登陆页面。

localize.description: 讓Zoom會議充滿樂趣 用Tricktionary爲您的下一次會議揭開序幕，5分鐘的創意刺激讓您的聽衆參與其中。優化爲4-14名玩家。*僅限今天*，如果你想和我們一起玩，我們將舉辦一場直播馬拉松。鏈接在登陸頁面。

nodes.excerpt: Have you seen that people are starting to change their profile picture in Clubhouse saying that they are in radio mode or listening? That is exactly what Clubhouse Tools does. It is a web app where you can set up your status through your profile picture.

localize.description: 你有没有看到，有人开始在会所里修改自己的资料图片，说自己是在广播模式或者是在收听？这正是Clubhouse工具的作用。它是一个网络应用，你可以通过你的个人资料图片来设置你的状态。

nodes.excerpt: 👋 Emoji is our common language. However, the ones we use are owned by big corporations. 👩‍💻 So we created a growing set that you can use in your brands, products, and presentations → https://sensa.co/emoji 🎁 We are giving away a custom emoji among our Twitter followers, like the Mr. Hoover one!

nodes.title: Skizzle - End-to-end encrypted attachments in Gmail
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Skizzle是Gmail的chrome扩展，让端到端加密变得简单--无需记忆、分享或管理密码--向任何Gmail地址发送加密附件--在公共区块链上验证文件访问--慷慨的免费永久计划。
localize.tagline: Gmail中的端到端加密附件。

localize.description: Skizzle是Gmail的chrome擴展，讓端到端加密變得簡單--無需記憶、分享或管理密碼--向任何Gmail地址發送加密附件--在公共區塊鏈上驗證文件訪問--慷慨的免費永久計劃。
localize.tagline: Gmail中的端到端加密附件。

nodes.excerpt: DPO-as-a-Service at Legal Nodes is 5 times more efficient than a DPO in-house. The monthly package includes: ○ designation of a DPO at your company; ○ 2 requests from your users; ○ 2 30-min consultations; ○ a tailored GDPR roadmap; ○ 3 document templates.
nodes.title: DPO as a Service - GDPR compliance with DPO as a Service
nodes.author: Margarita Sivakova

localize.description: 法律节点的DPO即服务比内部的DPO效率高5倍。每月套餐包括 在您的公司指定一名DPO；○2个用户的请求；○2个30分钟的咨询；○一个量身定做的GDPR路线图；○3个文档模板。
localize.tagline: DPO即服务的GDPR合规性

localize.description: 法律節點的DPO即服務比內部的DPO效率高5倍。每月套餐包括 在您的公司指定一名DPO；○2個用戶的請求；○2個30分鐘的諮詢；○一個量身定做的GDPR路線圖；○3個文檔模板。
localize.tagline: DPO即服務的GDPR合規性

nodes.excerpt: FaceCode is the most intelligent coding interview tool ever built. It's helps interviewers make objective hiring decisions with ease, speed and accuracy.
nodes.title: FaceCode 2.0 - The best coding interview tool ever built
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: FaceCode是有史以来最智能的编码面试工具。它能帮助面试官轻松、快速、准确地做出客观的招聘决定。
localize.tagline: 史上最好的编码面试工具

localize.description: FaceCode是有史以來最智能的編碼面試工具。它能幫助面試官輕鬆、快速、準確地做出客觀的招聘決定。
localize.tagline: 史上最好的編碼面試工具
